amendment.description: To protect civilian lives from unexploded cluster munitions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4882 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 70. Record Vote Number: 232.

action.text: Amendment SA 4882 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S8948-8950; text: CR S8948) To protect civilian lives from unexploded cluster munitions.
